Usage: gog <command> [flags]
Build: v0.10.0 (a92bd63)

Google CLI for
Gmail/Calendar/Chat/Classroom/Drive/Contacts/Tasks/Sheets/Docs/Slides/People

Config:

    file: /Users/brenner/Library/Application Support/gogcli/config.json
    keyring backend: auto (source: config)

Flags:
  -h, --help                  Show context-sensitive help.
      --color="auto"          Color output: auto|always|never
  -a, --account=STRING        Account email for API commands
                              (gmail/calendar/chat/classroom/drive/docs/slides/contacts/tasks/people/sheets)
      --client=""             OAuth client name (selects stored credentials +
                              token bucket)
      --enable-commands=""    Comma-separated list of enabled top-level commands
                              (restricts CLI)
  -j, --json                  Output JSON to stdout (best for scripting)
  -p, --plain                 Output stable, parseable text to stdout (TSV;
                              no colors)
      --results-only          In JSON mode, emit only the primary result (drops
                              envelope fields like nextPageToken)
      --select=STRING         In JSON mode, select comma-separated fields
                              (best-effort; supports dot paths). Desire path:
                              use --fields for most commands.
  -n, --dry-run               Do not make changes; print intended actions and
                              exit successfully
  -y, --force                 Skip confirmations for destructive commands
      --no-input              Never prompt; fail instead (useful for CI)
  -v, --verbose               Enable verbose logging
      --version               Print version and exit

Commands:
  send [flags]
    Send an email (alias for 'gmail send')

  ls (list) [flags]
    List Drive files (alias for 'drive ls')

  search (find) <query> ... [flags]
    Search Drive files (alias for 'drive search')

  open (browse) <target> [flags]
    Print a best-effort web URL for a Google URL/ID (offline)

  download (dl) <fileId> [flags]
    Download a Drive file (alias for 'drive download')

  upload (up,put) <localPath> [flags]
    Upload a file to Drive (alias for 'drive upload')

  login <email> [flags]
    Authorize and store a refresh token (alias for 'auth add')

  logout <email> [flags]
    Remove a stored refresh token (alias for 'auth remove')

  status (st) [flags]
    Show auth/config status (alias for 'auth status')

  me [flags]
    Show your profile (alias for 'people me')

  whoami (who-am-i) [flags]
    Show your profile (alias for 'people me')

  auth <command> [flags]
    Auth and credentials

  groups (group) <command> [flags]
    Google Groups

  drive (drv) <command> [flags]
    Google Drive

  docs (doc) <command> [flags]
    Google Docs (export via Drive)

  slides (slide) <command> [flags]
    Google Slides

  calendar (cal) <command> [flags]
    Google Calendar

  classroom (class) <command> [flags]
    Google Classroom

  time <command> [flags]
    Local time utilities

  gmail (mail,email) <command> [flags]
    Gmail

  chat <command> [flags]
    Google Chat

  contacts (contact) <command> [flags]
    Google Contacts

  tasks (task) <command> [flags]
    Google Tasks

  people (person) <command> [flags]
    Google People

  keep <command> [flags]
    Google Keep (Workspace only)

  sheets (sheet) <command> [flags]
    Google Sheets

  config <command> [flags]
    Manage configuration

  exit-codes (exitcodes) [flags]
    Print stable exit codes (alias for 'agent exit-codes')

  agent <command> [flags]
    Agent-friendly helpers

  schema (help-json,helpjson) [<command> ...] [flags]
    Machine-readable command/flag schema

  version [flags]
    Print version

  completion <shell> [flags]
    Generate shell completion scripts


Run "gog <command> --help" for more information on a command.
